alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Southeast Middlesex; Suffolk; Western Norfolk; Western Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 4:57PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...An area of torrential downpours will impact portions of south central Essex, northeastern Norfolk, Suffolk, southeastern Middlesex and northwestern Plymouth Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 457 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking heavy rain showers with embedded thunderstorms along a line extending from Lexington to Dedham to Holbrook. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Boston, Cambridge, Brockton, Quincy, Lynn, Newton, Somerville, Waltham, Malden, Brookline, Medford, Weymouth, Revere, Arlington, Everett, Woburn, Braintree, Chelsea, Natick and Randolph. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Southeast Middlesex; Suffolk; Western Norfolk; Western Plymouth
